channel.title: Need help learning how to make myself owner on 562 server
channel.description: I downloaded a 562 server and client called corruption X, but I still need to learn how to make myself the owner, so if someone could post how, I would appreciate it.

item.title: Need help learning how to make myself owner on 562 server
item.dc:creator: @arthur323 arthur323
item.description:
@arthur323 wrote:

Go to —> savedgame ----> your name example “jagex” open it up in wordpad and change rights to 2.

1 = Mod
2 = Admin/Owner
4 = Hidden Admin

Read full topic
item.source: Need help learning how to make myself owner on 562 server
